package.name: Lexel_UkAddressFinder
package.summary: UK Address Finder - Increase conversions and reduce customer keystrokes by up to 80%.
package.description:
UK Address Finder
Lexel's Postcode Address Finder will allow your customer to just enter a postcode, press "Find Address" and then have a select box with pre-selected address's that match the postcode your customer has entered.
This extension increases conversions and reduces customer keystrokes meaning that there's less errors when entering address information.
Features
- Reduces customer keystrokes by up to 80% - Reduces incorrect addresses saving you time on re-shipping items - Faster checkout improving conversions - Flexible licensing - Monthly/Annual Licences available (Please contact us)
Important Information
All you need to do is install the extension and then go to System -> Configuration -> Address Finder and follow the instructions.
The extension is free, however credits are not free and these need to be purchased through the Lexel website.
Please note we are unable to help with custom theme support.
package.notes: Add compatibility for One Step Checkout (http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/one-step-checkout-v4.html).
